quickly now listen to the story and we will do English speak practice with the question and answer method okay are you ready let's get

then he went to Wild West Town everyone seemed happy so he went to the saloon to celebrate
it but he saw that a nervous man was running towards  him he told Henry that there was a bank robbery Henry was very sad and

partner the man told Henry I know someone come with
me they went to a shooting range the man showed a blonde woman he said this is Bonnie she never misses a shot you can trust her Henry was
impressed so he explained everything to her hello are you enjoying the story please give us a like thank
you she agreed to help Henry they prepared their horses and set off they saw the robbers the robbers were crossing a rope

longer they spent the night playing instrument ments by the  campfire the next day they climbed the cliffs finally the parners found the
